lines.text: Scotia, Air Scotia, You're the airline that's for me. Scotia, Air Scotia, I'm very pleased to be With Scotia, Air Scotia, For you we'll do or die. Dinna fass yersel', dae it awfully well, We're yours, aye, in the sky.
Nul points! Nul Points! Even Lynsey de Paul and Mike Moran did better than that in 1977 with 'Rock Bottom' and they were shite!
I have a hunch the henchman is half-hearted in his horribleness.
I intend to win that grand, it's as good as in my hand, it's all planned, d'ye understand?
Every time I see you walking down the street, I get all shivery from my head down to my feet. I don't know what's going on down below, My organs aren't responding in a way that I know.
Say that you don't hate me, / Say that you will date me, / Tell me I'm your lover man. / When I look in your direction, / I get a selection of sensations / That I don't understand.
Hello Ms Spurtle, how's your arse for love bites?
Fine thankye, how's ye ear for dermatitis?
Piff Paff Poff! I want to have it off 'till I cough!
